column5: I was suprised to see this on my way to Sudbury on the weekend here sitting right along hwy 17 was a big friendly sign it was nice to see it and made me think of my friends from here.
That just goes to show ya ... you can run, but you can't hide from OFC.   Must be an obsession.
I guess you will have to take the 5KM drive west on Hwy 17 of our Bosses home town to find out. I dont think I can photoshop that maybe I had Terry help me
I have seen it and it is fabulous! many times in fact  Yes it is real folks... right by the bosses house like MrEh stated.   Gerritt.
YEAH,...............RIGHT......................some may believe, I am on the fence,
I have taken several pics of that billboard.
I thought I saw one just outside of Richmond last week..Good job guys. Joe
I could've sworn I saw one while driving thru Slap Out Alabama the other day!!!!
it's true !!  about 30west of Sturgeon Falls
Yep, TJ painted it himself, but Sturgeon Falls ran out of white paint, that's why the left side of it is grey  Joey
Yep, saw that last year on our first trip to Lakair.
